title: QRPay Pro - Digital Payment Solution
description: An all-in-one digital payment ecosystem with User, Merchant, and Agent apps. Features QR code payments, money transfers, mobile top-ups, and seamless payment gateway integration. Built for global scalability.

title: adMart - Online Grocery Shopping
description: adMart is a powerful, full-featured online grocery and pharmacy eCommerce platform designed for fast launches, seamless delivery, and scalable business growth. Built with Flutter and Laravel, it offers a complete package including a user-friendly mobile app, robust admin dashboard, and dedicated delivery panel â€” all optimized for performance and usability

title: Crypinvest - Crypto Investment Platform
description: A comprehensive cryptocurrency investment solution featuring a secure wallet, support for 20+ cryptocurrencies, personalized investment plans, and a multi-level referral system. Includes Android & iOS apps and a robust Admin Panel.

title: StripCard - Virtual Credit Card Solution
description: A secure virtual credit card platform allowing users to create and manage virtual cards for online transactions. Supports multiple payment gateways, KYC verification, and real-time statements.

title: ADoctor - Doctor Appointment Booking
description: A complete doctor appointment booking system connecting patients with doctors. Features include appointment scheduling, home service booking, health packages, and a comprehensive admin panel for clinic management.

title: AdFund - Fundraising Platform
description: A crowdfunding and fundraising platform empowering users to create campaigns and accept donations. Features include campaign tracking, donation history, and secure wallet management.
